casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Dennis BERRIOS Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 10, 2019 Pamela S. Nagy, assistant public defender, in support of the petition. Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 187 Conn. App. 661 , 203 A.3d 571 (2019), is denied.

ROBINSON, C.J., and KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
